title: Keity Wants To Shoutout One Bert Show Member's Partner
description:
A couple of weeks ago The Bert Show had dinner after work. After everyone left Keity and a few others stayed back to have another drink.
Over drinks, Keity gets a little emotional talking about her relationship with her dad. If you’re new to the show, Keity doesn’t have the best relationship with her dad and it has taken a toll on her over the years.
